Description:
We are a start up company. Our CEO has a real estate company in Belarus that has been operating for 6-7 years and now we are opening an office in Dubai and welcoming agents to join us.Responsibilities and Duties: Cold calls
Be knowledgeable of prices and values in the current housing market.
Advertise and promote local properties for sale.
Monitor and update property listings.
Manage the Listings and sell the secondary real estate.
Provide outstanding customer service to clients, understand their needs and preferences, and provide professional advice throughout the sales process.
Negotiate and close deals, ensuring all necessary documentation and paperwork are completed accurately and efficiently.
Attend training and industry events to continuously improve skills and knowledge.Skills
Skills: Knowledge of real estate market in Dubai

Strong prioritisation and time management skills.
Strong negotiation and closing skills.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
Self-motivated, ambitious, and result driven.
Persistent and proactive.
Proven problem-solving and team building skills.
Strong computer skills (Microsoft Office)
